Title: The Seventh Man
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Georgia Lee (written for television by), Georgia Lee (story editor)
Actors: Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham
Plot: Draper struggles with what happened on Ganymede while the coming Earth/Mars peace conference tighten the tension on Erringwright. Dawes confronts Fred Johnson about what the OPA's course of action should be regarding the protomolecule.
